h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: In your last encounter with the Venom Daoist, he sported quite a bit of arms -- some of which you may have lopped off during the course of the fight. This time, he only has two extra arms, but the same rules still apply for this fight -- at least part of it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
In your last encounter with the Venom Daoist, he sported quite a bit of arms -- some of which you may have lopped off during the course of the fight. This time, he only has two extra arms, but the same rules still apply for this fight -- at least part of it.
